org.grouplens.grapht

Class BindingFunctionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.grapht.BindingFunctionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class BindingFunctionBuilder
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    BindingFunctionBuilder provides a convenient access to the fluent API and converts calls to Context and Binding methods into multiple BindingFunctions.
    Author:
    GroupLens Research

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BindingFunctionBuilder.RuleSet
      BindingFunctionBuilder generates three binding functions at separate priorities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BindingFunctionBuilder()
      Create a new InjectorConfigurationBuilder that automatically generates bind rules for super and intermediate types.

      Create a new InjectorConfigurationBuilder.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BindingFunctionBuilder

        public BindingFunctionBuilder()
        Create a new InjectorConfigurationBuilder that automatically generates bind rules for super and intermediate types.

      • BindingFunctionBuilder

        public BindingFunctionBuilder(boolean generateRules)
        Create a new InjectorConfigurationBuilder. If generateRules is true, bind rules for super and intermediate types are generated. If it is false, only one bind rule is created per binding.
        Parameters:
        generateRules - True if additional bind rules should be generated

    • Method Detail

        public BindingFunctionBuilder clone()
        Overrides:

      • getGenerateRules

        public boolean getGenerateRules()
        Returns:
        True if bind rules for super and intermediate types should be generated

      • getRootContext

        public Context getRootContext()
        Returns:
        The root context managed by this builder

      • applyModule

        public void applyModule(Module module)
        Run the module's bind() method on the root context of this builder.
        Parameters:
        module - The module to apply

      • addDefaultExclusion

        public void addDefaultExclusion(Class<?> type)
        Add a type to be excluded from when generating bind rules. This does not invalidate bindings that bind directly to this type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to exclude
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type is null

      • removeDefaultExclusion

        public void removeDefaultExclusion(Class<?> type)
        Remove a type that is currently being excluded.
        Parameters:
        type - The type that should no longer be excluded
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type is null
        See Also:
        addDefaultExclusion(Class)
